channel.title: [PI] Change Prayer Book Everytime User logs in[PI]
channel.description:
Hi recently removed curses from my server. How do I make it so when a user logs in it auto switches them to normal prayer book ive tryed c.Altar = 0; in the login method but it did not work
Gah no one ever helps :(
